Package org.forgerock.openidm.router.impl

Class JsonResourceRouterService

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.router.impl.JsonResourceRouterService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.forgerock.json.resource.ConnectionFactory, IDMConnectionFactory
public class JsonResourceRouterService extends Object implements IDMConnectionFactory
Provides internal routing for a top-level object set.

Provides access to both internal and external Connections to suit the business-logic needs of the consumer.

As a traditional ConnectionFactory, the ConnectionFactory.getConnection() and ConnectionFactory.getConnectionAsync() methods retrieve a internal connection to the underlying ResourceProvider (generally the Router), which decorates the context chain with an internal ClientContext to indicate to routed ResourceProviders that the request was made internally.

When used as a IDMConnectionFactory, the IDMConnectionFactory.getExternalConnection() and IDMConnectionFactory.getExternalConnectionAsync() methods retrieve a external connection to the underlying ResourceProvider. This allows an internal call to propagate a request as being external without the Context chain being decorated. This may be useful when providing endpoints to authenticated users that relay (or proxy) requests to other parts of the system where we want to apply the same business logic as if these requests had been directly over HTTP.

      Description copied from interface: IDMConnectionFactory

      Description copied from interface: IDMConnectionFactory
